title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the IdeaAnonymizer system, including functional and non-functional requirements, security considerations, data privacy regulations, and stakeholder expectations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Create a high-level system architecture design, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema for storing and managing ideas, user information, and other relevant data.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for handling idea submission, vetting, and presentation to management.

title: Implement Frontend User Interface
description: Develop the frontend user interface for idea submission and management dashboard.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure data privacy, anonymity, and access control.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user documentation, including installation guides, usage instructions, and troubleshooting tips.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Conduct comprehensive testing, including functional, integration, security, and performance testing.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the IdeaAnonymizer system to the production environment and monitor for any issues.
